resource.name: User
resource.description: SCIM core resource for representing users

attribute.name: userName
attribute.description: Unique identifier for the User, typically used by the user to directly authenticate to the Service Provider

attribute.name: externalId
attribute.description: Unique identifier for the Resource as defined by the Service Consumer

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: The components of the User's real name

subAttribute.name: formatted
subAttribute.description: The full name, including all middle names, titles, and suffixes as appropriate, formatted for display (e.g. Ms. Barbara Jane Jensen, III.)

subAttribute.name: familyName
subAttribute.description: The family name of the User, or "Last Name" in most Western languages (e.g. Jensen given the full name Ms. Barbara Jane Jensen, III.)

subAttribute.name: middleName
subAttribute.description: The middle name(s) of the User (e.g. Jane given the full name Ms. Barbara Jane Jensen, III.)

subAttribute.name: givenName
subAttribute.description: The given name of the User, or "First Name" in most Western languages (e.g. Barbara given the full name Ms. Barbara Jane Jensen, III.)

subAttribute.name: honorificPrefix
subAttribute.description: The honorific prefix(es) of the User, or "Title" in most Western languages (e.g. Ms. given the full name Ms. Barbara Jane Jensen, III.)

subAttribute.name: honorificSuffix
subAttribute.description: The honorific suffix(es) of the User, or "Suffix" in most Western languages (e.g. III. given the full name Ms. Barbara Jane Jensen, III.)

attribute.name: displayName
attribute.description: The name of the User, suitable for display to end-users

attribute.name: nickName
attribute.description: The casual way to address the user in real life, e.g. "Bob" or "Bobby" instead of "Robert"

attribute.name: profileUrl
attribute.description: URL to a page representing the User's online profile

attribute.name: title
attribute.description: The User's title, such as "Vice President"

attribute.name: userType
attribute.description: The organization-to-user relationship

attribute.name: preferredLanguage
attribute.description: The User's preferred written or spoken language. Generally used for selecting a localized User interface. Valid values are concatenation of the ISO 639-1 two letter language code, an underscore, and the ISO 3166-1 2 letter country code; e.g., 'en_US' specifies the language English and country US

attribute.name: locale
attribute.description: Used to indicate the User's default location for purposes of localizing items such as currency, date time format, numerical representations, etc. A locale value is a concatenation of the ISO 639-1 two letter language code an underscore, and the ISO 3166-1 2 letter country code; e.g., 'en_US' specifies the language English and country US

attribute.name: timezone
attribute.description: The User's time zone in the "Olson" timezone database format; e.g.,'America/Los_Angeles'

attribute.name: active
attribute.description: A Boolean value indicating the User's administrative status

attribute.name: password
attribute.description: The User's clear text password. This attribute is intended to be used as a means to specify an initial password when creating a new User or to reset an existing User's password. This value will never be returned by a Service Provider in any form

attribute.name: emails
attribute.description: E-mail addresses for the User

attribute.name: phoneNumbers
attribute.description: Phone numbers for the User

attribute.name: ims
attribute.description: Instant messaging address for the User

attribute.name: photos
attribute.description: URL of photos of the User

attribute.name: addresses
attribute.description: The full mailing address, formatted for display or use with a mailing label

subAttribute.name: formatted
subAttribute.description: The full street address component, which may include house number, street name, P.O. box, and multi-line extended street address information

subAttribute.name: streetAddress
subAttribute.description: The full street address component, which may include house number, street name, P.O. box, and multi-line extended street address information

subAttribute.name: postalCode
subAttribute.description: The zipcode or postal code component

attribute.name: groups
attribute.description: A list of groups that the user belongs to

attribute.name: entitlements
attribute.description: A list of entitlements for the User that represent a thing the User has. That is, an entitlement is an additional right to a thing, object or service

attribute.name: roles
attribute.description: A list of roles for the User that collectively represent who the User is

attribute.name: employeeNumber
attribute.description: Numeric or alphanumeric identifier assigned to a person, typically based on order of hire or association with an organization

attribute.name: costCenter
attribute.description: Identifies the name of a cost center

attribute.name: organization
attribute.description: Identifies the name of an organization

attribute.name: division
attribute.description: Identifies the name of a division

attribute.name: department
attribute.description: Identifies the name of a department

attribute.name: manager
attribute.description: The User's manager

subAttribute.name: managerId
subAttribute.description: The id of the SCIM resource representing the User's manager

subAttribute.name: displayName
subAttribute.description: The displayName of the User's manager

resource.name: Group
resource.description: SCIM core resource for representing groups

attribute.name: displayName
attribute.description: A human readable name for the Group

attribute.name: members
attribute.description: A list of members of the Group
